definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The addition of steam inhibits the production of hydrogen cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸气的加入会抑制氰化氢的产率。

sentences.english: Then the steam passes into the turbine.
An overview was made to the basic theory on the system simulation of vapor-compression refrigeration plants.
sentences.chinese: 针对蒸气压缩式制冷装置仿真的基本理论进行了总结。

sentences.english: The volatile oils of Zanthoxylum schinifolium were extracted by water vapor distillation.
sentences.chinese: 采用水蒸气蒸馏法提取精制香椒子中的挥发油。

sentences.english: Drape towel over head to allow steam to be inhaled.
sentences.chinese: 披覆在头上的毛巾，让蒸气被吸入。

sentences.english: Mix that fantasy dreamscape sketch with the steampunk idea.
sentences.chinese: 把那个神奇的梦境图和蒸气朋克揉在一起。

sentences.english: GENERATE】We know that heating water can generate steam.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道将水加热可以产生蒸气。

sentences.english: They resemble the vapours that invariably rise upwards from forests and mountains during the latter part of the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 就好像雨季末期，蒸气会不断从山林中浮升起来。

sentences.english: Smoke was used to simulate steam coming from a smashed radiator.
sentences.chinese: 用烟来模拟从撞碎的散热器中冒出的蒸气。

sentences.english: It is known to everyone that stream rises from very hot water.
sentences.chinese: 人人都知道蒸气是从很热的水里冒出来的。

sentences.english: A stoma is an opening through which carbon dioxide goes in and oxygen and water vapor escape.
sentences.chinese: 气孔是二氧化碳进入而氧气和水蒸气逸出的开口。

sentences.english: KN-2 is running at circle line of Chi-Chi Town, Nan-Tou County.
sentences.chinese: 滂沱大雨中行驶于集集环镇铁路的庆仁2号蒸气机车。
配合蒸气使用效果更佳。

sentences.english: The influence of treating conditions in steam on the properties of residuum hydrocracking catalyst carrier was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水蒸气处理对渣油加氢催化剂载体性质的影响。
现在他们开始冒蒸气了。

sentences.english: Our breath is misting up the car windows.
sentences.chinese: 我们呼出的气渐渐给汽车的窗户上蒙上一层水蒸气。
